DScribeRecord.Title: National Academy of Sciences
DScribeRecord.Description: Membership correspondence, including telegram notification of Crick's election as a Foreign Associate (1969).
DScribeRecord.AccessConditions: The papers are available subject to the usual conditions of access to Archives and Manuscripts material, after the completion of a Reader's Undertaking.
DScribeRecord.UserWrapped1: Images are supplied for private research only at the Archivist's discretion. Please note that material may be unsuitable for copying on conservation grounds. Researchers who wish to publish material must seek copyright permission from the copyright owner.
DScribeRecord.UserWrapped5: Catalogued by Chris Beckett, Project Archivist, Francis Crick Papers, August 2003.
DScribeRecord.UserWrapped3: Compiled in compliance with General International Standard Archival Description, ISAD(G), second edition, 2000, and AACR2. Sent to Millennium in MARC21.
DScribeRecord.Creator: Beckettc
